name: Kill Pill (itch)
description:
Kill Pill is a Quake inspired first person shooter with the objective of killing gun and knife wielding capsules in this difficult fast paced old school FPS!

Also try out the recently released wave based mode.

Current Weapons:

  • Pistol
  • Sub-Machine Gun
  • Shotgun
  • Sniper

Current Enemy Types:

  • Gun Pills
  • Knife/Melee Pills

Try to beat your time and get the highest score possible!

Controls:

Movement: W, A, S, D
Shoot: Left Click
Pistol: 1
SMG: 2
Shotgun: 3
Pause: Esc
Quick Restart: F

If you ever forget the controls, they are shown on the pause screen.

Credit: Kenney's 3D Weapon Pack

Tip: Highly recommend the shotgun (Press 3)

Tip: If you find the game too difficult, try changing the difficulty setting
